Paper_Abstract: While most papers mislead and lie in evasive language, Neriya's work lies from the get go. `Neriya's` here to test your cognitive biases. to challenge your perceptions and encourage critical thinking. and to have fun while doing it. This paper is a playful exploration of the art of deception in academic writing, using humor and irony to engage readers in a discussion about the nature of truth and falsehood in research.
